Texto: 
enlarged right scrotum with overlying erythema.
enlarged heterogeneous, predominantly hyperechoic head, body and tail of the right epididymis with hyperemia on doppler evaluation.
epididymitis
epididymitis
tb
metastatic disease
adenomatoid tumor
with right testicle pain for 2 days.
